**Example 1: 场景详情**



Input: 

```
tccli iotvideoindustry DescribeScene --cli-unfold-argument  \
    --IntId 2
```

Output: 
```
{
    "Response": {
        "CreateTime": "2021-10-21 19:34:21",
        "IntId": 2,
        "RecordDuration": 3600,
        "RequestId": "1d7a62c9-db36-4a5f-9209-2e420883e28f",
        "SceneName": "测试场景1",
        "SceneTrigger": "{2222211}",
        "StoreDuration": 2,
        "Uin": "2",
        "UpdateTime": "2021-10-21 19:40:14"
    }
}
```
